MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G2 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.19pm. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:34pm on Sunday, 20 December 2020
